action_open_link_in_suspended_tab.message: Open link in new suspended tab

action_suspend_window.message: Suspend all other tabs in this window

action_suspend_window_forced.message: Force suspend all other tabs in this window

action_unsuspend_window.message: Unsuspend all tabs in this window

action_suspend_all.message: Suspend all tabs in all windows

action_suspend_all_forced.message: Force suspend all tabs in all windows

action_unsuspend_all.message: Unsuspend all tabs in all windows

page_options_migrate_comment.message: Enter 32 symbols of the other extension ID. You can get the ID from the URL of the suspended page. For example, URL: chrome-extension://liekplgjlphohhlnfaibkdjindpnfimg/suspended.html has extension ID: liekplgjlphohhlnfaibkdjindpnfimg.

page_options_migrate_progress.message: Migrating $AMOUNT$ tabs. Process can take several minutes.

page_options_migrate_done.message: Migration completed. The old extension can be deleted.

page_options_sessions_delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

page_options_sessions_import_error.message: Failed to load file. The file must be plain text and contain a single URL per line.

page_options_suspend_playing_audio.message: Suspend tabs that are playing audio

page_options_suspend_local_files_permiss.message:
Option "Allow access to file URLs" must be enabled on the Chrome extension page.
Warning: changing this option will close all suspended pages of this extension. Back up session before doing this.

page_options_never_suspend_unsaved_data.message: Never suspend tabs that contain unsaved form inputs

page_options_never_suspend_unsaved_data_.message: Requires access to all URLs and permission to execute scripts.

page_options_never_suspend_when_power_on.message: Never suspend tabs when connected to a power source

page_options_white_list.message: Never suspend tabs with URLs from the following list:

page_options_white_list_hint.message:
Each item on a new line.
Example:
	github.com
	youtube.com/watch

page_options_restore_scroll_position.message: Restore scroll position and enable dimmed tabs icons

page_options_restore_scroll_permissions.message: Requires access to all URLs and permission to execute scripts.

page_options_maintain_youtube_time.message: Save YouTube timestamps for the tab with video

page_options_youtube_permissions.message: Requires access to https://www.youtube.com/watch* and permission to execute scripts.

page_options_enable_context_menu_permiss.message: Requires access to the context menu.

page_options_sync_profile.message: Sync settings with your Chrome profile

page_options_favicons_mode_no_dim_permis.message: Uses the site favicon as-is. No extra permissions needed. Suspended tab icons are the same as non-suspended ones.

page_options_favicons_mode_google_permis.message: Loads icon from Google Favicon API and dims it. Can be different from the actual icon but requires only access to Google.

page_options_favicons_mode_actual_permis.message: Uses the exact site icon and dims it. Requires access to all URLs.
